name: Ultra Pong (Majed AZAR)
description:
Ultra Pong is a casual score-based game where you smash balls in space with a paddle. Unlike the original pong, there is only one player in this game and many balls. Your goal is to survive as long as possible. If 3 balls pass, you lose.

There is a variety of balls which are coming your way to challenge you: big balls, small balls, fast balls, fading balls and much more. You’ll also encounter a few powerups along your playthrough: big paddle, fast paddle, etc.

How long can you survive this rampage? Let’s find out!

WARNING!!! OpenGL 3.3 is required to run this game...
